Sentencas: Copper-doped SrZrO(3)perovskites prepared via solid-state reaction method are studied for structural, morphological, thermal and electrical properties using various characterisation techniques.
Titulo: Structural, thermal and electrical study of copper-doped strontium zirconate

Sentencas: The X-ray diffraction and Rietveld refinement confirm the monophasic orthorhombic structure of the undoped and doped samples.
Titulo: Structural, thermal and electrical study of copper-doped strontium zirconate

Sentencas: The shifting of the XRD peaks with doping is the manifestation of dopant Cu into the Zr site of SrZrO(3)lattice.
Titulo: Structural, thermal and electrical study of copper-doped strontium zirconate

Sentencas: The thermal expansion curves of doped and undoped samples vary linearly with temperature.
Titulo: Structural, thermal and electrical study of copper-doped strontium zirconate

Sentencas: The conductivity of the samples increases with copper doping.
Titulo: Structural, thermal and electrical study of copper-doped strontium zirconate

Sentencas: The activation energy of the samples suggests mixed electronic and ionic (protonic) conduction in the present samples.
Titulo: Structural, thermal and electrical study of copper-doped strontium zirconate

Sentencas: The conductivity of the doped SrZrO(3)increases up to three orders, i.e. 10(-4)S cm(-1)at 600 degrees C.
Titulo: Structural, thermal and electrical study of copper-doped strontium zirconate

Sentencas: The thermal and electrical properties are in the required SOFC range making Cu-doped SrZrO(3)suitable for use as cathode materials.
Titulo: Structural, thermal and electrical study of copper-doped strontium zirconate
